participant_1.background:
I'm doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot.
I value my relationship with my partner and make sure they know I am there for them.
I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.
i work at the hospital as a nurse.
I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.

participant_2.background:
My husband and I have been together for many years, and we are still very much in love.
i am an artist and create with my mind and my hands.
I enjoy the thrill of playing tennis and the freedom of driving my restored Mustang.
i use to be a huge superman fan as a child.
I like to listen to music from my childhood to make me feel younger.

content.text: Hi there! I'm doing well, but I miss my dad a lot. How are you?
Hello! I'm doing well. I'm glad to hear that you're doing well! My husband and I have been together for many years, and we're still very much in love. How about you, are you married?
No, I'm not married. I'm in a relationship, but it's still relatively new. I'm happy for you and your husband!
Thank you! We're very happy together. I'm an artist and create with my mind and my hands. I also enjoy playing tennis and the freedom of driving my restored Mustang. What are your hobbies?
I work at the hospital as a nurse. I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer. I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.
That sounds like a busy day! I love chocolate cake. I also enjoy writing. I used to be a huge Superman fan as a child. I still like to listen to music from my childhood to make me feel younger.
That's cool! I'm a big fan of The Walking Dead. I also like to listen to music from my childhood. It's a great way to relax and unwind.
I agree! Music is a great way to escape from the world for a little while. I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I'm looking forward to getting to know you better.
